author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: Ex-Blackstone, Tether Execs Seek $1B to Build Multitoken Crypto Treasury: Bloomberg
description: The company intends to buy a basket of tokens, including bitcoin, ether and sol.
content: A blank-check company backed by former Blackstone dealmaker Chinh Chu and Tether co-founder Reeve Collins is looking to raise $1 billion to build a publicly traded cryptocurrency treasury firm, Bloom… [+1323 chars]
